play: Will Fuller is heading to the locker room to be evaluated.
Watt bats down Brissett's quick slant
CATCH BY ROGERS. Tipped by the defender and still caught, and seemingly both feet down for the completion and a 19-yard gain.
Short slant pass from Brissett to Pascal, who scoots forward for the TD to draw first blood.
Texans Injury Update: S Tashaun Gipson Sr. is questionable with a back injury.
